component.name: SDR++
component.summary: SDR++ is a cross-platform and open source SDR software with the aim of being bloat free and simple to use.

description.p: Multi VFO, Wide hardware support (both through SoapySDR and dedicated modules), SIMD accelerated DSP, Cross-platform (Windows, Linux, OSX and BSD), Full waterfall update when possible. Makes browsing signals easier and more pleasant, Modular design (easily write your own plugins).
